TopicTitle: What does the KSP community want to see in Youtube videos?

Articles.Content:
Hello there!

I want to make a KSP-focused youtube channel (which currently doesn't exist yet, will make it this weekend), but I want to know:

1. What do KSP players (All of you guys, I assume  ) want to see? Rockets? Space Stations? Ludicrously sized behemoths? (I can't built ludicrously sized behemoths by the way). I want to create unique content, so yeah!

2. What are some things you guys expect from a KSP youtuber? Consistency? Quality videos?

Thanks!
